participant_1.background:
I love to spend my weekends playing hockey, especially when I get to do it with friends.
I paint for a living and my family is very supportive.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
my dad died when i was in high school.
I like to go to the park with my siblings and pretend we are dragon trainers.

participant_2.background:
I like to go swimming in the lake with my family to recapture the feeling of being a carefree kid again.
i am trying to play in a local band.
i am still single at the age of 35.
i m on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
i work in fast food.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Not bad, not bad, how about yours?
It's going pretty well! I just finished a painting, and I'm pretty happy with how it turned out.
That's awesome! I love painting, but I'm not very good at it.
Well, practice makes perfect! What kind of things do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes, but I'm not very good at it yet.
That's okay, everyone has to start somewhere! I'm sure you'll get better with practice.
Thanks! I'm going to keep practicing, and hopefully I'll get better.
I'm sure you will! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to go swimming in the lake with my family to recapture the feeling of being a carefree kid again.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love swimming too.
Yeah, it's a great way to cool off on a hot day.
I agree! Do you have any other hobbies besides swimming and painting?
I also like to play in a local band.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
We play mostly rock and roll, but we also do some blues and country.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to hear you play sometime.
We're always looking for new people to come to our shows. You should come to one sometime!
